text: The World of Vog Mur is a 1984 fantasy role-playing game supplement published by Iron Crown Enterprises for the Rolemaster role-playing game. ==Contents== The World of Vog Mur is a campaign setting which consists of three small islands, only the largest of which is inhabited. ==Reception== Jeff Ong reviewed The World of Vog Mur in Space Gamer No. 72. Ong commented that "World of Vog Mur will keep a group occupied for months of real time. Even if used only to add a little color to a campaing, it is definitely worth its [...] price." ==References== Category:Fantasy role-playing game supplements
title: The World of Vog Mur
